projects.name: QuickHammer
projects.description: A microservice-based web application for finding remote jobs and gigs built using event-driven architecture. Developed 8 microservices with best practices including saga orchestrator, choreographer, and resilience patterns. Implemented CI/CD pipeline.

projects.name: LifePill
projects.description: A software application designed to help find rare medicines and manage prescriptions efficiently. Developed the complete frontend for the web application and POS system using React and Electron.js. Contributed to database design and developed CI pipeline using Jenkins with SonarQube and OWASP quality controls.

projects.name: E-Rides
projects.description: A fully-featured e-bike rental platform built on scalable, event-driven architecture. Each function is handled by a dedicated microservice with database per service design. Designed system architecture and developed four key microservices (bike, review, reward, payment). Configured production-ready system with CI pipeline.
projects.status: Completed (First Runners Up - Innovate with Ballerina 2025)

projects.name: DevNerd
projects.description: A responsive blog application leveraging Sanity for content management, featuring speech-to-text functionality using Web Speech API. CI/CD pipelines using GitHub Actions ensure automated testing and deployment.

projects.name: Auction Hub
projects.description: An online auction site built with microservices. Developed monitoring solutions with Prometheus and Grafana, configured auto-scaling including VPA and HPA, and developed CI pipeline using GitHub Actions and Kubernetes manifests.

projects.name: DesignFlow
projects.description: A social media platform for designers to share designs and get community exposure. Features comprehensive CI/CD pipeline with static code analysis, image scanning, and automated deployments using Jenkins, SonarQube, Trivy, Docker, Terraform, Ansible, Kubernetes, and Argo CD.

projects.name: Ruhuna Academic Site
projects.description: Website developed for hosting academic sessions for University Of Ruhuna, hosted by Faculty of Engineering.

projects.name: AI Code Analyzer
projects.description: An AI-powered tool for detecting and explaining vulnerabilities in C code using advanced machine learning models. Developed a VS Code extension for seamless integration with developers.

projects.name: HPC Image Processing
projects.description: Parallelizing image kernel processing using HPC techniques. Demonstrates four computational approaches: Serial (CPU), OpenMP (multi-threaded), CUDA (GPU), and Hybrid (OpenMP + CUDA).

projects.name: React Voicify
projects.description: A React library to convert text to speech using Web Speech API. Published on NPM with features for voice selection, speech rate, pitch, and volume control.

projects.name: TutorHub
projects.description: A mobile application developed with Flutter to simplify finding home tutors. Enhances connectivity between students and tutors through a user-friendly environment.

projects.name: Quiz Application
projects.description: A quiz application including answering and quiz creation features built with MERN stack.
